attacks.name: Pick and Collect
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for up to 4 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Roll Over
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, both Snorlax and the Defending Pok√©mon are now Asleep. If tails, Snorlax is now Asleep.
